law.text: Tax funds collected shall be transferred to and held by the treasurer of the watershed conservancy district for the specific purpose for which they have been collected. All expenditures of such funds shall be made by the board of directors upon order of the board.
law.history: Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 10. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 203, sec. 16.
